trans-unit.source: Incredible Feat of Science (12 Intellect points) #Ability #Core
trans-unit.target: Incredible Feat of Science (12 Intellect points) #Ability #Core

trans-unit.source: You do something amazing in the lab. This takes parts and materials equivalent to three expensive items. Possible incredible feats include:
trans-unit.target: You do something amazing in the lab. This takes parts and materials equivalent to three expensive items. Possible incredible feats include:

trans-unit.source: Reanimate and command a dead body for one hour.
trans-unit.target: Reanimate and command a dead body for one hour.

trans-unit.source: Create an engine that runs on perpetual motion.
trans-unit.target: Create an engine that runs on perpetual motion.

trans-unit.source: Create a teleportation gate that remains open for one minute.
trans-unit.target: Create a teleportation gate that remains open for one minute.

trans-unit.source: Transmute one substance into another substance.
trans-unit.target: Transmute one substance into another substance.

trans-unit.source: Cure one person with an incurable disease or condition.
trans-unit.target: Cure one person with an incurable disease or condition.

trans-unit.source: Create a weapon designed to hurt something that can’t otherwise be hurt.
trans-unit.target: Create a weapon designed to hurt something that can’t otherwise be hurt.

trans-unit.source: Create a defense designed to protect against something that can’t otherwise be stopped.
trans-unit.target: Create a defense designed to protect against something that can’t otherwise be stopped.

trans-unit.source: Action to initiate; a full day of work to complete.
trans-unit.target: Action to initiate; a full day of work to complete.
